channel.title: Training on Malware Analysis: Or How I Learned To Love Frustration
channel.description: Recent content in Training on Malware Analysis: Or How I Learned To Love Frustration

item.title: The difference between Dynamic and Static analysis
item.description: Explaining the fundamental differences in dynamic and static analysis in reverse engineering malware samples across Windows, Mac and Nix endpoints.

item.title: 0xCC Conference
item.description: I was lucky enough to be in a position to attend 0xCC this year, run by women, for women in tech. This is a collection of my thoughts and feelings about the value this conference had in my career.
